name: unjoined
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not connected or fastened together: His handwriting is very poor, and his letters are still all unjoined. Seal the edges where they overlap, but leave the other edges unjoined. Related word
join verb
More examplesFewer examplesThe language makes use of particles, some joined to the noun or verb, some unjoined, to express shades of meaning.The unjoined chambers of the system can be filled with water to provide ballast.It was a beautiful gold ring with ends that were unjoined but flared attractively away from each other.
